_header: Summer is comen and winter gone
_description: A song of the Passion — eight l0-line stanzas (ababccdeed)

BLEge613.First Lines:
Somer is comen & winter gon þis day biginniz to longe&
                    þis foules euerchon Ioye hem wit songe…
BLEge613.Last Lines:
…grone he may & wepen ay þe man þat deiet wit oute
                    lay alonegrante ous crist wit þin uprist to gene
